title: US Fed expresses concerns over linking global payment systems with domestic for fast payments
description: Interlinking fast payment systems is widely seen as a means to enhance global cross-border payments and reduce costs, but Christopher Waller said that it could pose an increased risk management burden for banks participating in it.
